name: mailchimp-api
description: Interact with the Mailchimp Marketing API to manage campaigns, audiences, subscribers, and reporting. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: mailchimp_api
toolDefinition.description: Interact with the Mailchimp Marketing API to manage campaigns, audiences, subscribers, and reporting. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: list_campaigns (list email campaigns), get_campaign (get campaign details), create_campaign (create a new campaign), list_audiences (list audiences/lists), add_subscriber (add subscriber to list), get_campaign_report (get campaign performance report), search_members (search members across lists)

campaignId.description: Campaign ID. Required for get_campaign and get_campaign_report actions.

status.description: Campaign status filter (save|paused|schedule|sending|sent) for list_campaigns, or subscriber status (subscribed|unsubscribed|pending) for add_subscriber.

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-100, default 25). Used by list_campaigns and list_audiences.

type.description: Campaign type (default: regular). Used by create_campaign.

subjectLine.description: Email subject line. Required for create_campaign.

replyTo.description: Reply-to email address. Required for create_campaign.

listId.description: Audience/list ID. Required for create_campaign and add_subscriber. Optional for search_members.

email.description: Subscriber email address. Required for add_subscriber.

firstName.description: Subscriber first name. Optional for add_subscriber.

lastName.description: Subscriber last name. Optional for add_subscriber.

query.description: Search query (max 200 characters). Required for search_members.
